long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TabHopper: Effortless Tab Management for the Modern Browser

Description:
Streamline your browsing experience with TabHopper, the ultimate Chrome extension for efficient tab management. Whether you're juggling work, social media, shopping, or research, TabHopper has you covered with smart features that keep your tabs organized and your workflow smooth.

Key Features:

Auto-Tab Organizer: Automatically categorize and group your open tabs based on their content. Easily switch between work, social media, shopping, and more with a well-organized tab layout.
Tab Snoozer: Temporarily close tabs that you don’t need right now and set them to reopen later. Stay focused on your current tasks and let TabHopper bring back your snoozed tabs when you're ready.
Quick Tab Switcher: Instantly switch between tabs with a simple keyboard shortcut or search through open tabs with ease. No more hunting for the right tab—just hop to it!
Why TabHopper?:
TabHopper is designed for users who want to maximize their productivity by keeping their browser clutter-free and their tabs easily accessible. With intuitive features and a clean interface, TabHopper helps you stay organized and focused, whether you’re working, shopping, or browsing the web for fun.
